error.message: Call to deprecated constant FILE_CREATE_DIRECTORY: Deprecated in drupal:9.1.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. Use Drupal\Core\File\FileSystemInterface::CREATE_DIRECTORY.
Call to deprecated function file_prepare_directory(). Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use Drupal\Core\File\FileSystemInterface::prepareDirectory().
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to texbar.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 10. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
